msbt.message: A world of creativity awaits via the Custom Designs Portal!You can download custom designs from creators all over the world and even share your own designs.Would you like to access this internet kiosk?
A world of creativity awaits here at the Custom Designs Portal!Would you like to access this internet kiosk?
You can't use this kiosk until Communicating with Others is enabled in Parental Controls.
A world of creativity awaits within the Custom Designs Portal! Are you ready to access it online?
Your creator ID is currently visible to other players on your passport.If you do not wish to share your creator ID, you can hide it. What would you like to do?
Your creator ID will no longer appear on your passport.You can change this setting anytime from this kiosk.
Your creator ID is not currently visible to other players on your passport.If you wish to share your creator ID, you can change the setting now. What would you like to do?
Your creator ID will now appear on your passport.You can change this setting anytime from this kiosk.

Welcome to the Custom Designs Portal!This terminal will allow you to take home a custom design made by this dream provider.Would you like to connect to the internet to check out this dream provider's custom designs?
Welcome to the Custom Designs Portal!Would you like to check out this dream provider's custom designs?
You can't access the Custom Designs Portal while network communications are active. Please shut down communications from the airport counter and then try again.
Only registered residents of can use this Custom Designs Portal.
You can't use the Custom Designs Portal when you are playing with other island residents. Please come back to use this kiosk when you are playing alone.
You can't use the Custom Designs Portal when the gate in the airport is open for visitors.Please try again when the gate in the airport is closed.
